title: death recap
body: It would be cool if we got a more comprehensive death recap, at the moment it shows damage from 3 sources, more often then not the 3 damage sources are not the champions/towers/minions that are doing the most damage. a more comprehensive D.R., would allow us to gear around the champions who are focusing us vs gearing against collateral damage

replies.body: it should show at the top of the death recap the total damage received in percentages e.g 55% physical damage 42% magic damage and 3% true damage

It is broken and 90%of the time just look at what they are building and work off that. Normally you know who you want to build too counter just off score then know what to build by looking at their items.
